name: Historisches Konzert ... zu gunsten der Witwen u. Waisen LCCN2004666153 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Historisches Konzert ... zu gunsten der Witwen u. Waisen Abstract: Poster shows five military musicians in uniforms from various historical periods; the coat of arms of Austria-Hungary is at top. Poster is announcement for a concert by Austrian and Hungarian soldiers to benefit widows and orphans. Details are given. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 95 x 60 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Divéky.; Title from item.
